headline: How Investors May Respond To NIKE (NKE) Converse Layoffs And Restructuring In Its Turnaround Plan
summary: Nike has recently begun significant job cuts and restructuring at its Converse division after the brand reported a 30% sales decline and multi‑quarter performance challenges, with employees instructed to work from home during the process. The shake-up, including senior leadership changes and speculation about a potential Converse divestiture, underscores how central underperforming units have become to Nike’s broader “Win Now” turnaround plan. Next, we’ll examine how Nike’s deep Converse...

headline: Nike CEO Hill Sees Turnaround Spreading Across the World
summary: Nike President and CEO Elliott Hill discusses his expectations for the company's wholesale business to pick up steam across the world as it accelerates the launch of new footwear and apparel products and doubles down on its commitment to sports. He speaks exclusively to Bloomberg's Romaine Bostick in Milan.

headline: WeShop Announces Offerings in the Health and Fitness Category with Nike, Adidas, GNC Under Armour and Other Leading Retailers
summary: NEW YORK, Feb. 11, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WeShop Holdings Limited (“WeShop” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: WSHP), the world’s first community-owned social commerce platform, today announced access to leading health and fitness brands, including Adidas, Under Armour, Nike, ASICS, and GNC, through its marketplace, helping consumers stay committed to their health and wellness goals well into the new year. Within the WeShop app, members can shop a curated selection of health and fitness essentials spa
